xml.body:
@r345@
Mayster shether sayd he trustytt to se all
sych maters to be reformytt that we
whych we cold nott agre owre selves shuld
be sett att on : & he sayd no more
to me
Mayster percase sayd nothyng of owre
regio relegion but dyd lawghe whan
I told hym of the makyng of owre
lady sawter thes were answars as
farforth as I remembre
